title: 3 Roles a Senior Pastor Can't Delegate
itunes:title: 3 Roles a Senior Pastor Can't Delegate
description: In the weeds. That's where many senior pastors live. It's not usually a pride issue -- more a question of role clarity. Tony and Amy discuss the three roles only the senior pastor can do for a church, and why you should give yourself permission to delegate everything else.
content:encoded: In the weeds. That's where many senior pastors live. It's not usually a pride issue -- more a question of role clarity. Tony and Amy discuss the three roles only the senior pastor can do for a church, and why you should give yourself permission to delegate everything else.
itunes:subtitle: Are You Doing Too Much or Not Enough?
itunes:author: Tony Morgan
